title: A Mortal’s Journey to Immortality
summary: Han Li practiced hard for many years in the cave in Tianxing City and finally succeeded in forming the elixir. After leaving seclusion, Han Li searched for the spiritual object Heavenly Thunder Bamboo to refine a magic weapon. He was involved in the battle between Miaoyin Sect, Jiyin Island, and Yinsha Sect. He finally succeeded in refining the magic weapon, the seventy-two-mouthed green bamboo bee cloud sword. Later, when Han Li was exploring the ruins, he encountered the mysterious and powerful former Yuanying monk Master Xuan Gu and heard the legend of Xutian Palace. Han Li realized that the map he had obtained before might be one of the remaining maps of Xutian and decided to go to Xutian Palace to search for it. Opportunity.
subtitle: Immortal Ascension

title: Immortality S3
summary: In the majestic fantasy world, how does the protagonist Fang Han traverse the world with his own power? Relying on a stubbornness that refused to admit defeat, he broke through the mystery of supernatural powers and forged his physical body into an immortal body. Endless novel magic weapons, a new prosperous world of immortals, demons and mortals will be opened by the protagonist one by one. It will take you to experience the fantasy style of immortals, demons, humans, demons and gods, and kings and emperors. The protagonist will also experience love, hatred, entanglements, and battles between immortals and demons in the world. Eventually it will lead you on the road to the top.

title: One hundred thousand years of gas refining
summary: Il y a 100 000 ans, la Heavenly Phoenix Sect régnait sur le monde de la cultivation, et tous les disciples du clan étaient fiers et invincibles. Seul Xu Yang, le disciple fondateur de la secte, qui est au stade de raffinage du Qi, pour percer et s’élever dès que possible, Xu Yang s’est exilé pendant dix mille ans. Quand il est sorti de l’isolement, le monde de la cultivation avait décliné et il ne restait que trois ou cinq disciples de la secte Tianlan. Voyant que la secte était sur le point d’être anéantie, Xu Yang a repoussé un puissant ennemi et juré de ramener la secte Tianlan à son apogée ! Au fur et à mesure que la secte se développait, la vérité sur la culture de Xu Yang a été révélée étape par étape, et les mystères qui traversaient les trois royaumes des humains, des démons et des immortels ont été révélés au public. Deviendra-t-il un * avec une seule pensée, ou un démon avec une seule pensée ? La vie et la mort du monde sont dans la paume de Xu Yang

title: Leveling up in a fantasy world
Tiger Crane S1
summary: In a world where humans and demons constantly battle for dominance, magic practitioners known as “demon masters” dedicate their lives to hunting and exorcising demons. Qi Xiaoxuan, the leader of the national demon master team, unexpectedly meets the wandering Hu Zi. Together, they embark on a thrilling adventure to slay demons and uphold the ancient ways of Taoism. After five centuries of peace, the demons are once again stirring, threatening to cast a dark shadow over the future. Can Qi Xiaoxuan and Hu Zi protect the world from the looming demonic chaos?
subtitle: Hu He Yao Shi Lu

title: Ravages of time S2
summary: Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.
subtitle: Huo Feng Liao Yuan

title: Swallowed star
summary: After the Battle of Kirishima, Luo Feng received an inheritance from the Meteorite and gained a deeper understanding of his strength and the vast universe. With the help of the “intelligent life” Babata, Luo Feng practiced with all his heart and successfully entered the third level of planetary rank. The golden-horned behemoth appeared in the base city of America, and a great catastrophe followed. Humanity’s strongest weapon formation is vulnerable to giant beasts, and an extinction crisis comparable to or even surpassing the “Nirvana Period” is coming again. All the Transcendent Gods of War gathered in the Palace of War God and connected with the high-level leaders of the five major powers to share information. In the footage captured from the front line, humans saw the fierce destructive power of this giant beast. The head of Han Xiaguo was the first to release the top-secret files, revealing information about the starry sky behemoth. Under the existential threat posed by the golden-horned behemoth, mankind has reached unprecedented unity. Can Luo Feng and the warriors defeat the Golden Horn Behemoth? Can the Earth survive this crisis smoothly?
subtitle: Tunshi Xinkong

title: Martial Master
summary: Le protagoniste Qin Chen, qui était à l’origine le plus grand génie du domaine militaire, a été conspiré par le peuple pour tomber dans le canyon de la mort dans la terre interdite du continent. Qin Chen, qui était inévitablement mort, a déclenché de manière inattendue le pouvoir de la mystérieuse épée ancienne. Trois cents ans plus tard, dans une partie reculée du continent de Tianwu, un garçon du même nom hérite accidentellement de la volonté de Qin Chen. En tant que petit-fils bien-aimé du roi Dingwu de l’armée nationale Daqi, en raison de la naissance du père biologique, la mère et le fils ont été traités froidement dans le palais de Dingwu et ont vécu ensemble. Afin de réécrire le mythe de l’homme fort dans l’espoir du soleil, et de protéger tout ce qu’il aime, Qin Chen a résolument pris la responsabilité de maintenir les cinq royaumes du monde et a remis le pied sur la route des arts martiaux.
subtitle: Wushen Zhuzai

title: The Eternal Strife S1
summary: In an attempt to understand the fundamentals of martial arts, a common young man in a small town is duped by someone, goes through a terrible romantic relationship, and becomes embroiled in a disagreement within the martial arts community. Others wrong him because of who he is. He sets off on a quest to battle the heavens while fighting to survive and gradually regains memories of his past existence. He gains the most priceless love and the deepest friendship along this journey. He endures innumerable hardships and the possibility of dying, yet he never wavers from who he is. No matter how formidable his opponents are, he never backs down in his struggle for justice, himself, and his destiny
subtitle: Bu Shi Bu Mie

title: Shrouding the heavens
summary: Shrouding the Heavens Zhe Tian, In the far reaches of the dark and frozen universe, nine enormous dragon corpses were tied to an ancient bronze coffin. It seems that they have been there since the birth of the universe. Such an astonishing scene was captured by a space probe floating in outer space. Nine dragons and the mysterious bronze coffin made people wonder whether they came back to ancient times or just reached the other shore of the universe. A giant mythical world was unfolded, where immortality gradually appeared and paranormal events continuously occurred. Countless people started to find their own tracks (the Dao) in such a mythical realm. Their passion was like a turbulent ocean wave that would never cease. The heat in their blood was like erupting volcanoes. Their desire for power and immortality dragged them down to the chasm without knowing it. Thirty-three classmates held a reunion after graduating. Their friendship was tested as the bronze coffin took them away from earth and arrived on another unknown planet. The desire to live forced them to follow the path of the ancient gods. Entering a new world of cultivation, will any of them reach immortality, or will they all die along the way?
subtitle: Zhe Tian

title: Peerless Martial Spirit
summary: The Xuanling Sect, the head of the four major sects, came to Shuicheng to select disciples for the first time in many years. The Fang and Qin families started fighting openly and secretly around this opportunity that would determine their fate. In the end, Qin Nan relied on his dedicated training, excellent
subtitle: Jue Shi Zhan Hun

title: Apotheosis S1
summary: Zen Luo, who is now a menial slave, used to be a young master of a big family, owing to the decline of his family, his sister is imprisoned by a strong force, he has no choice but to be at others’ service. However, Every cloud has a silver lining, The ancient book left by his father actually conceals the magical spell, which can change a human into an instrument! What’s the mysterious power behind all these? This is a contest with fate.
subtitle: Bai Lian Cheng Shen

title: Sword of coming S2
summary: There are all kinds of things in the world. A poor boy in Lizhu Cave Heaven who should have great luck was unable to seize the opportunity because his natal porcelain was broken. Based on this, many bigwigs focused on the boy and made arrangements, so that the boy’s friends got great opportunities, but the boy was at the center of the storm…
subtitle: Jian Lai

title: The Legend of the Taiyi Sword Immortal
Tomb of Fallen Gods S1
summary: The book takes the protagonist Chen Nan’s search for his lover Yuxin ten thousand years ago and the pursuit of the secrets of the demise of gods and demons as clues. It tells the legends of countless heroes and beauties, and discusses elements such as human nature, society, life and other elements.
subtitle: Shen Mu

title: Ancient Supremacy
summary: Lin Yun, once a sword slave in the Qingyun Sect of Tianshui Kingdom, is reborn with extraordinary potential. Though previously known for his poor aptitude, his life changes after mastering the Fierce Tiger Fist technique, allowing him to break through to the third level of martial arts, qualifying him as an outer disciple of the sect. However, despite his progress, Lin Yun continues to face discrimination from other disciples due to an unwritten rule: “Once a sword slave, always a sword slave.” On his challenging martial arts journey, Lin Yun must defy expectations, seize every opportunity for growth, and break free from the stigma of his past to reach the pinnacle of martial arts mastery.
subtitle: Yishi Du Zun, The Sovereign’s Ascension

title: Lord of Wonderlands
subtitle: Lord of all worlds - Dominator of Myriad Realms

title: Legend of xianwu
summary: Ye Chen, a disused apprentice from the sect, was expelled from the sect and had no home to call home. By chance, he got a real fire by chance, and then embarked on the road of immortal martial arts. This is a world where gods, demons, immortals, and Buddhas stand side by side. This is an era of chaos in the heavens and myriad realms. Ye Chen’s journey against the sky began from this point, and after going through hardships and reincarnation, he finally reached the pinnacle of the great road .
subtitle: Xianwu Emperor

title: Soul Land
summary: The Tang Sect did not tolerate Tang San, an outer disciple of the Tang Sect, for stealing the inner sect’s secret knowledge. When he jumped off a cliff to express his ambition, he found that he did not die. Instead, he came to another world with another identity, a world of martial arts named Douluo. There is no magic, no fighting spirit, and no martial arts here, but there is a magical martial spirit. Everyone here, when they are six years old, will awaken their spirits in the Spirit Hall. Martial spirits include animals, plants, and utensils. Martial spirits can assist people in their daily lives. Some of the particularly outstanding spirits can be used to practice and fight. This profession is the most powerful and glorious professional “soul master” on the Douluo Continent. The little Tang San began his journey of training as a soul master in the Holy Soul Village and came up with the dream of revitalizing the Tang Sect. When Tang Sect’s hidden weapons come to the Soul Land Continent and Tang San’s martial spirit awakens, can he recreate the glory of Tang Sect in this martial spirit world?
subtitle: Douluo Dalu

title: The God of Ten Thousand Realms
The success of empyrean xuan emperor
The Peak of True Martial Arts
The uninhabited wonderland
summary: n the vast and boundless world of immortals, the culture of cultivating immortals prevails, and mortals are proud to become monks. College student Lu Hangzhi traveled from modern times and became a mortal servant in Ziyun Town. He lived a life of walking on thin ice every day, but he refused to accept
subtitle: Wild Fairyland

title: Renegade Immortal
summary: Wang Lin is a very smart boy with loving parents. Although he and his parents are shunned by the rest of their relatives, his parents always held high hopes that he will one day become someone great. One day, Wang Lin suddenly gained the chance to walk the path of an immortal but found that he only had mediocre talent at best. Watch Wang Lin as he breaks through his lack of talent and walks the path towards becoming a real immortal!
subtitle: Xian Ni

title: The Demon Hunter S1
summary: Meng Chuan witnessed his mother killed before his eyes, so he trained very hard hoping to one day avenge her death. But his peaceful days were broken as his wedding engagement being called off, an invasion by foreign forces, the sanctuary fallen into enemy hands… In order to protect the people of Ning City, he picked up his sword and vowed to be the strongest. This is a heavy responsibility and a long journey…
subtitle: Cang Yuan Tu

title: Apotheosis S1
summary: Zen Luo, who is now a menial slave, used to be a young master of a big family, owing to the decline of his family, his sister is imprisoned by a strong force, he has no choice but to be at others’ service. However, Every cloud has a silver lining, The ancient book left by his father actually conceals the magical spell, which can change a human into an instrument! What’s the mysterious power behind all these? This is a contest with fate.
subtitle: Bai Lian Cheng Shen

title: Legendary Twins Special
summary: The extra-episode movie of The Twins. Watch Xiaoyuer and Su Ying go on adventures together!
subtitle: Juedai Shuang Jiao: Tian Wai You Tian

title: Legendary Twins
summary: The follows a pair of twin brothers who, because of a feud between two formidable martial artists, were separated at birth and raised on opposing sides.
subtitle: Juedai Shuang Jiao

title: Blader Soul
summary: Deux enfants qui vivaient dans l’ombre d’une famille aristocratique aspirent au légendaire pays des fées de Penglai. Les sorciers sont arrivés, l’étoile Gan Shi est passée et la pierre étoile a jeté un trépied, réveillant le pouvoir enfoui dans chacun de leurs corps ainsi que leur désir jusqu’alors inédit.
subtitle: Bu Xing Si Yuan Qi

title: Martial universe S3
summary: Lin Dong, the male protagonist, is introduced to the art of cultivation by a mysterious seal. He travels throughout the land to perfect his skills. On his adventures, he meets two very different women in Ling Qingzhu (and Ying Huanhuan) and becomes romantically involved with them both. Lin Dong rises to be a highly respected cultivator through his determination and sheer determination. Lin Dong learns more about the world’s darkest secrets as Lin Dong gains power. Soon, he discovers that the demon sect is plotting to overthrow the world. The three young men join hands with righteous martial arts to defeat all evil and restore peace to the land.
subtitle: Wu Dong Qian Kun

title: The Great Lord of Destiny
summary: The story of “The Great Lord of Destiny” Set in the mystical Dahe Divine Continent, story unfolds in a world where good and evil are at constant war. For centuries, the righteous sects united to resist the tyranny of the Twelve Demon Sects. But with the sudden rise of demonic forces, the righteous sects are forced into retreat, standing on the brink of collapse. Li Wannian, an ordinary cultivator from the Jinyi Sect, dreams of a simple life, earning his salary and avoiding trouble. However, during a routine mission, he discovers a game-changing ability: the power to resurrect on the spot. Each time he dies, not only does he come back to life, but he also gains rewards based on how “heroically” he perishes. To grow stronger, Li Wannian must die gloriously and meaningfully—turning sacrifice into a path to becoming the strongest cultivator. Are you ready for a tale of epic sacrifices and ultimate triumphs?

title: Martial universe S1
summary: The Great Yan Empire exists in a world where respect can only be earned through strength. Within this Great Yan Empire, the four great clans have always stood above the rest. Among them, a particular incident in the Lin Clan resulted in the banishment of a certain individual who went on to start his own family, in hopes of one day being recognized again by the Lin Clan, and rejoining them… Hailing from a banished family of the Great Lin Clan, when Lin Dong was very young, he watched, powerless, as his talented father was easily crushed and crippled by the overwhelming genius of the great Lin Clan, Lin Langtian. With a despairing father, a heartbroken grandfather, and a suffering family, ever since that fateful day, Lin Dong has been driven by a deep purpose; to take revenge on the man who had taken everything and more from his family. Armed with nothing but willpower and determination, join Lin Dong as he unknowingly discovers a destiny greater than he could ever hope to imagine when he stumbles upon a mysterious stone talisman…
subtitle: Wu Dong Qian Kun

title: The path to heaven
subtitle: king of casual/loose cultivators - tong tiuan zhi lu

title: Magic chef of ice and fire
Battle through the Heaven Special 2
summary: In a land where no magic is present. A land where the strong make the rules and weak have to obey. A land filled with alluring treasures and beauty, yet also filled with unforeseen danger. Three years ago, Xiao Yan, who had shown talents none had seen in decades, suddenly lost everything. His powers, his reputation, and his promise to his mother. What sorcery has caused him to lose all of his powers? And why has his fiancee suddenly shown up?
subtitle: Dou Po Cang Qiong: Tebie Pian 2 - Sha Zhi Lan Ge

title: Battle through the Heaven S3
summary: Xiao Yan had been waiting for three years before finally meeting Xun’er at Canaan Academy. After their meeting, he made new friends and established the Panmen group. However, his ultimate goal was to avenge his father and improve his strength so that he could join forces with the Mikami Yunlan Sect. To achieve this, he committed a personal crime and went deep into the Sky Burning Qi Refining Tower to devour the fallen heart flames. After defeating the Yunlan Sect, Xiao Yan’s mentor, Yao Lao, was taken by the Soul Palace. In their pursuit of Xiao Yan, the Soul Palace enlisted the help of the Little Fairy Doctor and ordered the Poison Sect to attack the Yan Alliance. Despite successfully defending his alliance, Xiao Yan was afflicted with demonic poison spots. To cure himself and rescue Yao Lao, Xiao Yan, along with the Little Medical Fairy and Zi Yan, journeyed to Zhongzhou. Little did they know the dangers that awaited them there.
subtitle: Dou Po Cang Qiong - fights break sphere

title: Ravages of time S1
summary: Nearly 2000 years ago, the prosperous Han dynasty of China collapsed. Heroes rose and fell, and three nations emerged–Wei, Shu, and Wu. Historians refer to this period as the Three Kingdoms period. The romance of the three kingdoms is an intriguing tale of heroic deeds, of alliance forged and broken, of loyalty and betrayal.
subtitle: Huo Feng Liao Yuan

title: The Demon Hunter S2
summary: Meng Chuan witnessed his mother killed before his eyes, so he trained very hard hoping to one day avenge her death. But his peaceful days were broken as his wedding engagement being called off, an invasion by foreign forces, the sanctuary fallen into enemy hands… In order to protect the people of Ning City, he picked up his sword and vowed to be the strongest. This is a heavy responsibility and a long journey…
subtitle: Cang Yuan Tu S2

title: Stellar Transformations S6
summary: Qin Yu and his three sworn brothers ascend to the Divine Realm, where new challenges await. As he learns the complex rules of this powerful world, Qin Yu sets his sights on becoming the strongest Forging God to marry Jiang Li, a woman from one of the Divine Realm’s eight great families. Starting from eliminating bandits, he rises through the ranks, gaining recognition from the Holy Emperor and becoming a noble figure. However, when Jiang Li’s family announces a competition for her hand in marriage, Qin Yu must present three unparalleled gifts to win. After countless hardships, he crafts a one-of-a-kind Hongmeng spiritual treasure. Just when victory seems assured, Jiang Li’s family unfairly declares Zhou Xian the winner, igniting Qin Yu’s fury…
subtitle: Xing Chen Bian

title: Stellar Transformations S2
summary: In a galaxy far away, there is a kid without innate ability to practice internal techniques. So, in order to gain the respect of his father, he resolutely chooses to follow the more difficult and painful path of practicing external techniques. As the years go by, eh grows up, but what really changes his life is a mysterious meteoric crystal stone – the Meteoric Tear. This stone fuses with the young man’s body unnoticed, and he seems to undergo drastic transformations as a result. After that, everything is changed. Eventually his father knows that the son for whom he hasn’t really shown a lot of consideration possesses astonishing abilities. And there’s a lot more to come
studio: Shanghai Foch Film and TV Culture Investments
subtitle: Xing Chen Bian

title: Stellar Transformations S3
summary: In a galaxy far away, there is a kid without innate ability to practice internal techniques. So, in order to gain the respect of his father, he resolutely chooses to follow the more difficult and painful path of practicing external techniques. summary: In a galaxy far away, there is a kid without innate ability to practice internal techniques. subtitle: Xing Chen Bian

title: Soul Land S2
summary: The Tang Sect lives in a turbulent world. There is nothing but a martial spirit here. Ten thousand years after the founding of the Tang Sect, it is in relative decline. An extremely talented man was born. Can the new Shrek Seven Monsters revive the Tang Sect and bring it back to glory? A soul beast over one million years old; Electrolux who can pick stars; the new soul utensil system that led to the decline of the Tang Sect… A lot of secrets are to be revealed. Can the secret weapons of the Tang Sect be sharp again? Can the Tang Sect regain its former glory?
subtitle: Douluo Dalu II Jueshi Tangmen - Peerless Tang Sect

title: The Tale of The Spirit Stone
Peerless Battle Spirit
summary: Young Chen Feng, his dantian is like iron, unable to practice. Only the mentor does not abandon and does not want the master to be killed by the strong. Since then, no one will protect him and be bullied by others. Chen Feng devoted himself to guarding the tomb for five years, only to discover that the master had died in feigned death, and found the supreme dragon blood left behind by the master, the mysterious ancient tripod. Since then, Chen Feng has risen against the sky and embarked on the path of finding a master and becoming a strong man.
subtitle: Jueshi Wu Hun

title: Divine Lord of the Heavens
summary: Le jeune homme Qin Yang était très talentueux et possédait l’artefact de cultivation enviable « Star Gate ». Cependant, cette chance lui a été retirée du jour au lendemain. Alors qu’il était sur le point de mourir, Qin Yang a ouvert le trésor couvert de poussière « God Bead » dans son corps. Depuis lors, il a restauré la mémoire de ses neuf vies précédentes et a gagné une nouvelle vie. Dans le même temps, la famille est tombée dans une crise sans précédent. Face à de nombreuses épreuves, Qin Yang a pris en charge ses propres affaires et s’est appuyé sur l’expérience accumulée au cours de ses neuf vies antérieures pour surmonter les difficultés encore et encore. De manière inattendue, les conspirateurs continuent d’avancer pas à pas. Afin de protéger les personnes qu’il chérit, Qin Yang choisit de se battre jusqu’au bout.
subtitle: Shendao Dizu - Shinto Emperor : rebirth of Qin Yang

title: Tomb of Fallen Gods S2
summary: Chen Nan and his companions left the Dong Chu Kingdom and joined Shen Lan Academy as disciples. Together with Meng Ke’er and others, they embarked on a journey to uncover the truth behind the demonic path and the path of destruction. At the same time, the secrets of Chen Nan’s own origins gradually began to surface.

title: Battle through the Heaven - The Three-Years Agreement
summary: The talented young man became a scum and was ostracized by his family, coupled with his fiancée who came to his residence to break the marriage in public. Xiao Yan made a three-year agreement and shocked the audience with a bold statement: “30 Years of the West River, 30 Years of the East River, never bully someone casually! ” With the help of Mr. Yao Lao, the legendary counterattack was opened by this fallen genius!
subtitle: Doupo Cangqiong: San Nian Zhi Yue

title: Stellar Transformations S4
summary: In a galaxy far away, there is a kid without innate ability to practice internal techniques. So, in order to gain the respect of his father, he resolutely chooses to follow the more difficult and painful path of practicing external techniques. As the years go by, he grows up, but what really changes his life is a mysterious meteoric crystal stone – the Meteoric Tear. This stone fuses with the young man’s body unnoticed, and he seems to undergo drastic transformations as a result. After that, everything is changed. Eventually his father knows that the son for whom he hasn’t really shown a lot of consideration possesses astonishing abilities. And there’s a lot more to come.
studio: Shanghai Foch Film and TV Culture Investment
subtitle: Xing Chen Bian

title: Perfect world
summary: Born into a unique world where villages fight to gain power and control, the main character, Shi Hao, is a genius blessed by the heavens born under the poorest of conditions. His clan, however, has a mysterious past. To rise up and become the genius he is meant to be, the clan goes through every effort to aid his cultivation as they battle through fanatical monsters and engage in power struggles with other clans. His journey will bring him through unknown lands until he is able to become a person who can truly shake the world.
subtitle: Wanmei Shijie

title: Myriad Realms Supreme
subtitle: Wan Jie Zhi zun - The sovereign of all realms

title: One way or another
summary: In the village hidden within the Chaotian Continent, Jing Jiu unexpectedly takes in Liu Shisu, a child prodigy with a natural Taoist seed, as his book attendant. The two of them come to Qing Shan Sect by chance, yet Jing Jiu, who is considered ordinary, actually serves the prodigy Liu Shisu as his servant, which draws criticism from others. At the Sword Inheritance Conference, Jing Jiu also meets Zhao La Yue, the girl from Shen Mo Peak. “Lazy” Jing Jiu just wants to cultivate in peace, but little does he know that fate will pull the three of them into a huge dispute in the martial world… In the village hidden within the Chaotian Continent, Jing Jiu unexpectedly takes in Liu Shisu, a child prodigy with a natural Taoist seed, as his book attendant. The two of them come to Qing Shan Sect by chance, yet Jing Jiu, who is considered ordinary, actually serves the prodigy Liu Shisu as his servant, which draws criticism from others. At the Sword Inheritance Conference, Jing Jiu also meets Zhao La Yue, the girl from Shen Mo Peak. “Lazy” Jing Jiu just wants to cultivate in peace, but little does he know that fate will pull the three of them into a huge dispute in the martial world…
subtitle: The path toward heaven - Da Dao Chao Tian

title: Every disciple is a Boss S1
summary: Gao Leng Dao Zun, the number one god in the universe, recruits young girls who will surely become big bosses in the future as his disciples, and leads them on an adventurous journey to change the universe towards destruction. The road ahead is difficult and dangerous. Can they successfully pass the test
subtitle: Over Goddess

title: Battle through the Heaven S4
summary: Xiao Yan came to the imperial capital to participate in the Alchemist Conference to awaken Master Yao Lao, but due to his extraordinary power, an evil enemy conspired to fight him. At a critical moment, Xiao Yan managed to turn things around and managed to win the championship, retaining the honor of the Jiama Empire. Xiao Yan welcomed the upcoming 3-year agreement with a not-so-happy heart.
subtitle: Dou Po Cang Qiong - fights break sphere

title: Battle through the Heaven S2
summary: Xiao Yan had been waiting for three years before finally meeting Xun’er at Canaan Academy. After their meeting, he made new friends and established the Panmen group. title: Battle through the Heaven S5
summary: After three years of not seeing each other, Xiao Yan finally met Xun’er at Jia Nan Academy. After that, they became closer and established the Stone Gate (Pan Gate). In order to continue to improve his strength and avenge him on the Misty Cloud Sect, he risked continuing to go deeper into the Qi Refining Pagoda to devour the Fallen Heart Flame
subtitle: Dou Po Cang Qiong - fights break sphere

title: My Journey in an Alternate World
Every disciple is a Boss
summary: Gao Leng Dao Zun, the first god of the universe, recruits young girls who are bound to become big bosses in the future as his disciples, and leads them on an adventurous journey to change the universe towards destruction. The road ahead is difficult and full of difficulties. Can they successfully pass the test and build a new world?
subtitle: Over Goddess , Tudi Ge Ge Shi Da Lao

title: My WeChat is connected to Dragon Palace
subtitle: Wo de Wei Xin Tong Longgong

title: Immortality S4
summary: In the majestic fantasy world, how does the protagonist Fang Han traverse the world with his own power? Relying on a stubbornness that refused to admit defeat, he broke through the mystery of supernatural powers and forged his physical body into an immortal body. Endless novel magic weapons, a new prosperous world of immortals, demons and mortals will be opened by the protagonist one by one. It will take you to experience the fantasy style of immortals, demons, humans, demons and gods, and kings and emperors. The protagonist will also experience love, hatred, entanglements, and battles between immortals and demons in the world. Eventually it will lead you on the road to the top.

title: Battle through the Heaven : The Origin
summary: The talented young man became a scum and was ostracized by his family, coupled with his fiancée who came to his residence to break the marriage in public. Xiao Yan made a three-year agreement and shocked the audience with a bold statement: “30 Years of the West River, 30 Years of the East River, never bully someone casually! ” With the help of Mr. Yao Lao, the legendary counterattack was opened by this fallen genius!
subtitle: Doupo Cangqiong: The Origin, Fights Break Sphere: The Origin

title: Battle through the Heaven S1
summary: The talented young man became a scum and was ostracized by his family, coupled with his fiancée who came to his residence to break the marriage in public. Xiao Yan made a three-year agreement and shocked the audience with a bold statement: “30 Years of the West River, 30 Years of the East River, never bully someone casually! ” With the help of Mr. Yao Lao, the legendary counterattack was opened by this fallen genius!
subtitle: Doupo Cangqiong S1, Fights Break Sphere S1

title: Adventure in subduing the demons
summary: In a forgotten era buried in dust, ancient powers vie for their path to become emperors. Jiang Hao, a modern young man who was once just a pawn, embarks on a journey into the prehistoric Great Wilderness to uncover the mystery behind his father’s disappearance. Armed with a partially complete “power bank” totem, he battles fierce adversaries, forging a path through primitive tribes and ancient cities. His journey takes him across dangerous lands where he learns ancient totemic sorcery from the powerful beasts he encounters. Battling not only men and beasts but also the heavens themselves, Jiang Hao faces cosmic threats that aim to engulf the six beautiful wildernesses. In a final act of defiance, he transforms himself into a blazing sun to confront the otherworldly demons. Little does he know that destiny’s chains are tightening, and his father’s presence remains a haunting memory.

title: Journey to the West: Asura, Crazy King
Chronicles of Everlasting Wind and Sword Rain
Sword of coming S1
summary: There are all kinds of things in the world. A poor boy in Lizhu Cave Heaven who should have great luck was unable to seize the opportunity because his natal porcelain was broken. Based on this, many bigwigs focused on the boy and made arrangements, so that the boy’s friends got great opportunities, but the boy was at the center of the storm…
subtitle: Jian Lai

title: Martial universe S5
summary: Young Lin Dong embarks on a quest to uncover the whereabouts of the Devouring Ancestral Symbol, venturing deep into the ancient monument of the Great Wilderness. Through relentless and focused cultivation, he finally reaches the long-awaited Clan Competition… Confronting Lin Langtian, the Lin family’s prodigy who crippled his father and inflicted cruel harm upon him, Lin Dong burns with unresolved humiliation and seeks vengeance to turn the tables!
subtitle: Wu Dong Qian Kun

title: Immortality S2
summary: Since young, lowlife servant Fang Han had held the belief that “it’s better to be a beggar than someone else’s servant.” With this belief in mind, and relying on his own strength, he managed to sweep across the world. With an unyielding spirit, he mastered the art of the divine and forged an eternal body, walking step by step into the realm of the Immortals before finally reaching the pinnacle.

title: Everyone in my sect is undercover except me
Tales of herding gods
summary: n the Disabled Elderly Village, there live nine elderly people with unpredictable origins and the young man Qin Mu they raised. One day, the cows that Qin Mu was responsible for grazing began to speak human words. From then on, Qin Mu became more aware of the dangers and beauty of Daxu, a land abandoned
subtitle: Mushen Ji

title: Immortality S1
summary: Since young, lowlife servant Fang Han had held the belief that “it’s better to be a beggar than someone else’s servant.” With this belief in mind, and relying on his own strength, he managed to sweep across the world. With an unyielding spirit, he mastered the art of the divine and forged an eternal body, walking step by step into the realm of the Immortals before finally reaching the pinnacle.

title: Battle through the Heaven Special
summary: In a land where no magic is present. A land where the strong make the rules and weak have to obey. A land filled with alluring treasures and beauty, yet also filled with unforeseen danger. Three years ago, Xiao Yan, who had shown talents none had seen in decades, suddenly lost everything. His powers, his reputation, and his promise to his mother. What sorcery has caused him to lose all of his powers? And why has his fiancee suddenly shown up?
subtitle: Doupo Cangqiong Special, Fights Break Sphere Special

title: Legend of Assassin
summary: Anhe, l’organisation de tueurs la plus mystérieuse au monde, est composée des trois noms de famille Su, Xie et Mu. Tous ont été empoisonnés et leur vie est en jeu. Après avoir appris la nouvelle, les trois forces de la rivière Anhe ont profité de l’occasion pour lancer une rébellion. Su Muyu, en tant que chef du groupe de garde de l’Ombre de l’araignée, fit venir Bai Hehuai, le médecin de génie de la Vallée du Roi-Médecin, pour soigner les anciens, tout en repoussant les tueurs et en protégeant l’ancien Zhouquan. À cette époque, son ami Su Changhe à Anhe, mais au nom de la famille Su, se joint à l’opération d’assassinat du patriarche.
subtitle: Tales Of Dark River

title: My senior brother is too steady
summary: Li Changshou, a terminally ill young man, was accidentally reborn in the ancient times before the Conferred God War and became a Qi refiner. In order to cultivate immortality and live in the cruel wilderness, he acted in a low-key manner, planned everything before he acted, never stepped into danger easily, hid his cards, practiced escapism, and refined erysipelas, until one day, his master suddenly gave him After taking in a junior sister and returning, Li Changshou, who wanted to cultivate in a low-key manner, was involved in many adventures. Be as steady as an old dog if you don’t move, startle when you move, and leave quietly after moving. While defeating evil enemies, you can make like-minded friends and realize your own life value.
subtitle: Shixiong A Shixiong

title: Martial universe S4
summary: Swallowing the ancestral talisman that reappears in the world, Lin Dong single-handedly bloodbaths the Yin Puppet Sect. The Lin clan will gather, and let’s see Lin Dong’s new image become a blockbuster!
subtitle: Wu Dong Qian Kun

title: The Secrets of Star Divine Arts
